SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILDQUOTA_PROCESS_CHILD
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Process one child to check for quota room and register or put on waiting list
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILDQUOTA_PROCESS_CHILD( @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier, -- Child ID, @lockFailed bit, -- Whether or not the child's project / country was successfully locked @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier -- Used to specify change agent for ChangedByID and AddedByID fields )
as begin -- ** TODO validate parms)
if @lockFailed = 1 begin declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkIneligibile tinyint = 1 --Child - Mark ineligible declare @BatchCommitLockedFailedText nvarchar(100) = 'Batch Commit - lock failed'
-- ** TODO ** Put this into SETINELIGIBLE sprocs
declare @BatchCommitLockedFailedID uniqueidentifier select @BatchCommitLockedFailedID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = lower (@BatchCommitLockedFailedText) and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkIneligibile
exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_SETINELIGIBLE @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID, @BatchCommitLockedFailedID, @changeAgentID end else begin
declare @childList dbo.USR_UDT_QUOTAPROCESSCHILDREN
insert @childList select dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTATYPE(slocation.FIELDOFFICEID), slocation.FIELDOFFICEID, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCOUNTRYID (child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID), child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, child.DATEADDED from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION child inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY sopp on sopp.ID = child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on sopp.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID where child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
begin try exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILDQUOTA_PROCESS_CHILDLIST @childList, @changeAgentID, '', '' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
end
return 0
end
